typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@Column_1 == source2@Column_1,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(source1@Column_1),
	avg = avg(toInteger(source2@Column_1)),
		count = count(toInteger(source2@Column_1))) ~> Aggregate1
